purpose: To enable the development of AI agents using a standardized protocol and workflow patterns
principle: Leverages the Model Context Protocol to define and manage agent workflows and interactions
reusability: Offers a modular framework that supports integration with various AI models and workflows through a unified protocol
limitations: As an alpha stage project, it may have limited documentation and stability issues, and it may not support all desired AI models or workflows
name: mcp-agent
description: Build effective agents using Model Context Protocol and simple workflow patterns
highlight: Facilitates the creation of effective AI agents using Model Context Protocol for streamlined workflows
